author: arminw
msg: - add new batch handling
- update/refactoring Statement classes
- add new PB.update(Object obj, String[] fields)
- change insert order of m:n relations
- change repository.dtd, add element 'batch', rename element
'connection-pool' to 'connection-factory', remove implementation
dependent attributes and add custom-attributes instead
- remove unused classes

author: arminw
msg: merge with 1.0.x branch
- rework the session bean examples
- add new beans showing how to handle exception and rollback behavior of beans
- fix bug in odmg behavior in managed environments, do cleanup of cache and locks
in Synchronization#afterCompletion call (here we now if an distributed-tx was successful or
not), instead doing all cleanup in Synchronization#beforeCompletion
- move assign of FK for 1:1 relations from lock method call to commit call of the
main object (this guarantee that the referenced object is already stored and the extracted
